attributes.action: commend David Healy, the Northern Ireland footballer, for his record breaking performances during the recent 2008 European Qualifiers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Healy's winner on Saturday 17/11/07 against Denmark was his 13th goal of the current campaign, beating the record set by Croatia's Davor Suker 12 years ago

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
